No Second Thoughts Speaking in an interview with Diane Sawyer of ABC News earlier this week, Donald Rumsfeld put it this way: What you know today can help you unthink your thinking about tomorrow. It can't help you with things you were thinking about back then, he said.`` Back then, there was reasonable confidence that[ Saddam Hussein ] had these weapons.'' At Facebook, 26-year-old founder and CEO Mark Zuckerberg calls the shots in an entrepreneurial culture that has enticed dozens of engineers to leave Google Inc. to work for the social networking company. During the call, Sergey Brin expressed what sounded like genuine admiration for Eric Schmidt 's role in Google's success. We're all in great debt to Eric Schmidt , said Sergey Brin .`` There's really no one else in the universe who could have done what Eric Schmidt has done.''
